mapper.select: SELECT USERID, PUTDATE, TITLE, AUTHOR, GENRENAME, TAG, LIKECNT, BOOKNUM FROM USERBOOK LEFT JOIN BOOKINFO USING(BOOKNUM) LEFT JOIN GENRE USING(GENRENUM) WHERE USERID = #{userid} ORDER BY PUTDATE DESC
SELECT USERID, READDATE, TITLE, AUTHOR, GENRENAME, TAG, LIKECNT, BOOKNUM FROM RECODE LEFT JOIN BOOKINFO USING(BOOKNUM) LEFT JOIN GENRE USING(GENRENUM) WHERE USERID = #{userid} ORDER BY READDATE DESC

SELECT GENRENUM, GENRENAME, TAG, CNT FROM (SELECT GENRENUM, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM RECODE LEFT JOIN BOOKINFO USING(BOOKNUM) LEFT JOIN GENRE USING(GENRENUM) WHERE USERID = #{userid} GROUP BY GENRENUM ORDER BY CNT DESC) LEFT JOIN GENRE USING(GENRENUM) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3

SELECT BOOKNUM, TITLE, SUBSTR(GENRENUM, 0, 2) GN FROM BOOKINFO WHERE GENRENUM IN ( SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR(U.CONT, '[^|]+' , 1, LEVEL) CONT FROM (SELECT GENRENUM CONT FROM USERINFO WHERE USERID = #{userid} )U CONNECT BY LEVEL <= length(REGEXP_REPLACE(U.CONT, '[^|]+',''))+1) ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM
